name: Beat Saber: Queen Music Pack
summary:
Beat Games studio brings fresh beats from Queen to Beat Saber! Dive into the pulsing music of Queen and slash the beats in our brand new Queen Music Pack. See you on the leaderboards!

Queen Music Pack includes the tracks:

Another One Bites the Dust
Bohemian Rhapsody
Crazy Little Thing Called Love
Don’t Stop Me Now
I Want It All
Killer Queen
One Vision
Somebody to Love
Stone Cold Crazy
We Are The Champions
We Will Rock You

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Beat Saber - PS VR2 Reveal Trailer and Queen Music Pack Announcement | PS VR2 Games
